title: Provided that if the carpet area of any occupant/tenement in the old building is 100 sq
clause_text: Provided that if the carpet area of any occupant/tenement in the old building is 100 sq. m or more then he shall be eligible for additional area only on the basis of carpet area of 100 sq. m

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that if the carpet area of any occupant/tenement in the old building is 100 sq. m or more then he shall be eligible for additional area only on the basis of carpet area of 100 sq. m
